subtree.caption: Name server dns.nic.cr (200.107.82.100) does not answer queries over UDP.
subtree.description: The name server failed to answer queries sent over UDP.  This is probably due to the name server not correctly set up or due to misconfigured filtering in a firewall.

subtree.caption: Name server dns.nic.cr (200.107.82.100) does not answer queries over TCP.
subtree.description: The name server failed to answer queries sent over TCP.  This is probably due to the name server not correctly set up or due to misconfgured filtering in a firewall. It is a rather common misconception that DNS does not need TCP unless they provide zone transfers - perhaps the name server administrator is not aware that TCP usually is a requirement.
